Member Function Documentation

◆ CreateWebsocketRequest()

void discpp::Shard::CreateWebsocketRequest ( rapidjson::Document &  json,
const std::string &  message = "" 
)

Send a request to the websocket.

Be cautious with this as it will close the websocket connection if the packet is invalid.

bot.CreateWebsocketRequest(request_json);
Parameters
[in]jsonThe request to send to the websocket.
[in]messageThe message to print to the debug log. If this is empty it will be set to default. (Default: "Sending gateway payload" + payload)
Returns
void
